entry.title: $2063 // NEW 1.5bed / 1bath__Elevator__Parking__NEXT to Myrtle JMZ
entry.content:
1.5 Bed / 1 Bath. Brand new building next to Myrtle/Broadway JMZ trains. Super spacious sun drenched 1.5 bed with huge windows. Post card views of the manhattan skyline. Elevator building with dishwasher,microwave,bike storage and laundry in building. Eight parking spaces and one private storage unit are available. Giant closets and steps to the best night life and food and beverage Brooklyn has to offer. *Listed price is net of one month free*

Stockton St. / Broadway Ave.

CALL or TEXT 2 6 7 . 4 4 3 . 7 7 9 8 to view.

entry.title: $2425 // Amazing renovated 1BR sick WBurg location near several trains NO FEE
entry.content:
===\\\**^**^**^**NO FEE!!!**^**^**^**///===

Spacious true 1BR in Williamsburg with queen sized bedroom, closet space, newly renovated kitchen and spacious living room. Brand new hardwood floors and charming exposed brick throughout. Central heat and a/c! You do not want to miss out on this awesome place.

Transportation:
1 minute to the JMZ at Hewes St
4 minutes to the G at Broadway
6 minutes to the L and G at Lorimer/Metropolitan Ave

--NO BROKER FEE--

Call or text ONLY (no emails please) ==>>==>>//9:1:7|||7:9:2|||1:4:0:2\\<<==<<==
